

webpack-dev-server --devtool eval --hot --progress --colors --config js/webpack.config.js --port 8081 --host 0.0.0.0 --content-base ./

npm install essence-appbar essence-bottomsheet essence-button essence-card essence-chip essence-core essence-data-table essence-dialog essence-icon essence-image essence-input essence-list essence-menu essence-navigation essence-paper essence-progress essence-slider essence-snackbar essence-switch essence-tab essence-toast essence-tooltip essence-touchpad

cd ../essence-appbar/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-bottomsheet/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-button/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-card/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-chip/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-core/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-data-table/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-dialog/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-icon/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-image/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-input/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-list/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-menu/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-navigation/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-paper/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-progress/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-slider/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-snackbar/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-switch/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-tab/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-toast/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-tooltip/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-toolbar/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
cd ../essence-touchpad/; npm run babel; npm version patch; npm publish;
